channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 05:56 Dumping anxiety in the Chernivtsi region. Watch for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 05:56 Dumping anxiety in the Chernivtsi region. Watch for further messages.#Chernivtsi_ This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
